tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE content_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_name VARCHAR(255),
    publish_date TIMESTAMP,
    is_published BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE published_content (
    publish_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    platform_id INT,
    publishing_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES content_schedule(content_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (platform_id) REFERENCES publishing_platforms(platform_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Published_Content (
  content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  content_title VARCHAR(255),
  publish_date TIMESTAMP,
  author_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES Content_Authors(author_id)
);
